title: Coronavirus

Resources Regarding Covid Mandates

Job Listings – No injections required

Brochure: Myths and Truths About Covid-19

Covid-19 Flyer References

Settling the Virus Debate

Top 10 things you should know about COVID shots

COVID-19 Vaccines: Important Points

What We Know Now



The Great Covid Virus Debate

Drs. Andrew Kaufman and Thomas Cowan respond to their critics

What Covid-Madness Is All About – A Call to Action

by Dr. Natasha Campbell-McBride

Understanding Our Current Health Crisis

Tom Cowan considers various layers to the Covid-19 story, with an addendum

Air Pollution, Biodiesel, Glyphosate and Covid-19

Stephanie Seneff looks into factors behind Covid-19 hot spots

COVID-19: Pursuing Truth to Protect Our Liberties

Kendall Nelson analyzes the coronavirus situation

Interview With Leslie Manookian Behind The Coronavirus

Leslie Manookian lifts the coronavirus veil

Covid: No Record Found Of SARS-CoV-2

Curiosity led a biostatistician down an unusual path. She was intrigued by the concept that the SARS-CoV-2 virus has not been isolated ever.

COVID: Connect The Dots With David Martin

Dr. David Martin questions the current narrative.

It’s Gene Therapy, Not a Vaccine

Dr. David Martin, founder and chairman of M-CAM Inc, challenges our presuppositions about the new mRNA Covid-19 vaccines.

Understanding Our Current Health Crisis

with Dr. Tom Cowan. What is going on? Is the coronavirus an infectious disease as we’ve been told? Is there a different way to understand viruses and our current health crisis?

Behind the Coronavirus

Leslie Manookian, the writer and producer of the documentary “The Greater Good” gives us context to consider related to the coronavirus.

A Different Take On Our State Of Emergency

Lockdowns, shuttered businesses, curfews and more have left a lot of us scratching our heads… and asking important questions. Dr. David Martin, the Founder and Chairman of M-CAM Inc., is an author, public speaker, and innovator who has done a lot of research on our current state of affairs.

Health Freedom: What’s At Stake

Sayer Ji, the founder of GreenMedInfo, the world’s largest open-access natural health database, and the author of “Regenerate,” challenges the conventional narrative of the pandemic. And he explains what’s at stake–economically, socially, psychologically and health-wise–as we respond to this crisis.

Be Informed: Ramifications For Our Children

What are our current restrictions – masks, lockdowns, social distancing, and more – doing to our children? What does the future hold for them? Will there be mandatory testing and vaccination?

The Contagion Fairy Tale

Tom Cowan and Sally Fallon Morell further deconstruct the contagion myth

Is Coronavirus Contagious?

Sally Fallon Morell deconstructs the contagion model for coronavirus

Rational Debate Can Be Respectful If We Stick to The Facts

A Response to James Lyons-Weiler by Mike Donio and Dr. Tom Cowan

Covid: There Is No Virus

Dr. Tom Cowan considers a completely different point of view of today’s “pandemic.”

Are Germs The Enemy?

Dr. Andy Kaufman, molecular biologist and psychiatrist, helps us wrap our heads around germ theory and contrasts it with terrain theory.

Is The Coronavirus Contagious?

We’ve spent most of 2020 under the assumption that there is a contagious disease spreading and that we have to do what we can to sanitize our environment and stay away from one another to avoid infection and death. But has the coronavirus actually been proven to be contagious? Has it even been proven to be a virus in the first place? Joining Holistic Hilda on the show, Sally Fallon Morell, president of the Weston A. Price Foundation, challenges these assumptions we’ve been operating under.

Top 10 Reasons not to let your child get a Covid shot

COVID-19 INJECTIONS: WHAT THE OFFICIALS ARE SAYING

The COVID Shot: No Turning Back

Dr. Larry Palevsky, a NYS-licensed pediatrician and a past president of the American Holistic Medical Association talks about COVID shot consequences.

Vaccine Facts Few Know About

with Robert F. Kennedy Jr. Most scientific journals suggest that vaccines are safe and effective. Many medical personnel say the same. Why would anyone question the “party line”?

Is a Coronavirus Vaccine a Good Idea?

Dr. Andrew Wakefield, an expert in vaccines, whistleblower of sorts, and director of the documentary “Vaxxed,” helps us step back and look at the big picture.

Health Freedom: The Power Of Choice

There’s a lot that feels out of control at this moment in history. But Del Bigtree tells us there are a few things we still have agency over.

Be Informed: Ask Questions

Why is there an avoidance of scientific debate on the topic of injections? What are the consequences of the singular paradigm of modern science and medicine?

Be Informed: What The Future May Hold

What problems are restrictions and mask mandates causing? What are the side effects of the COVID-19 “vaccine”? What might happen to our children if we choose to have them get the shot?

Be Informed: Reasons For Reservations

Many people around the world are getting COVID injections. But many like Christian Elliot are also disinclined to do so.

Covid: Keep Kids Grounded in Turbulent Times

Dr. Stanton Hom, a pediatric chiropractor, Hilary Boynton talk about how we can help our children feel safe, happy, and grounded during these challenging times.

COVID: Homeopathy For Prevention And Detox Post-Shot

Anke Zimmermann explains how homeopathy can help.

Common Sense in the Face of COVID-19

with Joel Salatin. Wash your hands. Do social distancing. Are these the only two things we can do to protect our health during this pandemic?

Proactive Amidst This Crisis

with Dr. Zach Bush. Anxiety is running high right now. We feel helpless, and perhaps even powerless, in the face of this “virus.” Dr. Zach Bush, physician, international educator, and thought leader on the microbiome, suggests two ideas to empower us in our desire to protect our health

Lori Gregory and Dr. Andy Wakefield discuss on this podcast how much our times resemble those of the fictitious novel “1984.” Their recent movie “1986: The Act” also touches on the topic of cover-ups, misinformation, and the problems related to the vaccine injury court established in 1986.

Robert F. Kennedy Jr. sounds the alarm bells about the level of censorship in our country. Today he discusses why our Bill of Rights is being trampled on—from the lack of freedom to a jury trial (when it comes to vaccine injury) to the purging of posts on social media platforms that runs contrary to the mainstream narrative when it comes to our current health crisis.

Autism rates have skyrocketed over the last few decades. Toby Rogers looks at the cost.

Sometimes we think we have to do one GINORMOUS thing to make a difference in the world. But even a drop in the bucket can help fill a bucket to the point of overflowing. Dr. Devin Vrana offers thought-provoking, candid insights on the front lines of medical freedom advocacy.

What would you do if you were in the military and your commanding officer ordered you to get a series of vaccinations? This was the situation of Major Jim Gallagher in the 1990s. Today, Jim tells the story of what happened to him and his colleagues. We also hear from Joe Ordia and Patty Healy.

Mask mandates, contact tracing, and looming vaccine passports have caused many to grow concerned and confused. Leslie Manookian asks what are our rights?

The Health Freedom Defense Fund offers resources such as Frequently Asked Questions about mandates for masks, COVID-19 tests, and COVID-19 vaccines as well letters to provide an employer, school or other entity information regarding federal law. If the document you are looking for is not yet posted below, please check back as they will post more soon. https://healthfreedomdefense.org/resources/

The president of The Health Freedom Defense Fund, Leslie Manookian, was recently interviewed on Dr. Tom Cowan’s podcast. It’s available here: https://drtomcowan.com/podcast/. If you can’t listen to the complete interview, we recommend starting at the 55 minute mark.

Below is an excerpt, related to how to handle employer mandates.

Attorney Kevin Barry NY said if you have a employer who gave you a vax mandate, get it documented in writing or however. When and if the employer claims to not be accepting exemptions, do not listen these lies. It is nonsense. The employer does not get the right to determine if you get a religious or medical exemption. You determine that by filing a religious objection, and you can call it a religious objection.

Do not cite any laws, especially laws less Supreme than the Constitution which specifies religious beliefs and practices are inalienable. medical rights are not clearly spelled out. So religious rights trump medical rights. You musts file for an exemption. You must file it timely before any mandate goes into effect. You may wish to have a paper prepared for the person to whom you deliver it signs to declare they received it on a certain date and time. You can also mail it and pay for return signature card to you, but that may take longer. If you are told only that you are required to get a mandatory vax, you immediately write up your own religious objection, each should be unique. You are protected class only if you file a religious objection and only if you do it timely. If they suggest nobody is collecting exemptions, etc, they are trying to tag you out if you don’t know the rules of the game. You are safe until they can get you to move off the base that protects you. What this means is that they don’t want to deal with your rights. You are protected only if you file your religious exemption in writing timely.

Use language “fetal cell line issues in manufacturing and testing of all 3 COVID-19 vaccines available in the USA”. This will enable you to sue them in court, to file EEOC claims against them and to get a severance package on the way out.” You need to file 2-3 pages, can go longer if inspired, but you will need to file more than what was required in 2018 and 2019 for vaccines in general with “my body is the temple of the Lord,” which you can use but you need much more. It needs to be individualized to each person–not a template. Hindu, Jew, Christian, etc can file. Do not put all your eggs in one basket about “fetal cell lines”. Use “fetal DNA fragments”. Do not cites statutes or laws. Center only on faith and take for granted your employer knows the law. When the employer says he isn’t accepting exemptions, they say this to tag you out and to harm you, to persuade you to wander off the base where otherwise you are safe. They are lying to you. They are giving you bad info that they will use against you, if you do not assert your rights timely.

The Texas hospital lawsuit that was lost was lost because they didn’t file their written exemptions with the Texas hospital where they worked. You can consult anybody anywhere, but only an attorney licensed in your state can go to Court. In NY the attorney providing this advice is going to court for students and for health care workers in separate cases. This mandate clearly violates religious rights. There is no question this is religious discrimination. Health care workers have been given September 27 to comply or be fired. If 30-40% hospital workers or teachers won’t show up, they would have to change policy. It’s people’s fears that cause them to do what they know instinctively will harm them. This is Attorney Kevin Barry who wrote the book “Vaccine Whistleblower: Exposing Autism Research Fraud at the CDC” with Robert F Kennedy JR doing the forward. He’s been in this field over 20 years.
